name: Elinext Group

overview:
Elinext Group is an alliance of custom software development companies working to deliver software solutions and consulting services to businesses worldwide.

SALES DISTRIBUTION 60% North America 20% Europe 20% Rest of the World (RoW) (RoW: Russia, CALA, MEA, Asia & Pacific region)
